title: Lot of 3 Full Page Harper's Woodcuts - MAKE AN OFFER!
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: Lot of 3 Full Page Harper's Woodcuts - MAKE AN OFFER!
posts.post_content:
Send an email to [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested. This is a lot of 3 full page, original Harper's Woodcuts from the 19th Century. The first image is a photo of all three full pages from my camera-phone. Below that I have made up-close scans of the baseball images:
[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/ZwWpxY90Bxk39QRX8uBGXQ?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh5.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/SmPC5jwT5cI/AAAAAAAAHDs/h9Jdsjw6szE/s800/IMG00118-20090719-2100.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
From [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/pmifsud3d/Sales?feat=embedwebsite"]Sales[/URL]
July 24, 1869:
